ai-sn34:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:1.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:1.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in entering it.
ai-sn34:1.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:1.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in entering it.
ai-sn34:1.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in entering it.
ai-sn34:1.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in entering it is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:1.1.9_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee.
ai-sn34:1.1.10_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled in immersion and entering it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.”
ai-sn34:1.1.11_0: First the first part of the body.
ai-sn34:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:2.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:2.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:2.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:2.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:2.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:2.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in remaining in it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:2.1.9_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee.
ai-sn34:2.1.10_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled in immersion and remaining in it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.”
ai-sn34:3.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:3.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:3.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in emerging from it. ...”
ai-sn34:3.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in emerging from it.
ai-sn34:3.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in emerging from it.
ai-sn34:3.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in emerging from it.
ai-sn34:3.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in emerging from it is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:3.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:3.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:4.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:4.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:4.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:4.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:4.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:4.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:4.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in gladdening the mind for immersion is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:4.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:4.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:5.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:5.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:5.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in the supports for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:5.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in the supports for immersion.
ai-sn34:5.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in the supports for immersion.
ai-sn34:5.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in the supports for immersion.
ai-sn34:5.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in the supports for immersion is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:5.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:5.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:6.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:6.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:6.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in the meditation subjects for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:6.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in the meditation subjects for immersion.
ai-sn34:6.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in the meditation subjects for immersion.
ai-sn34:6.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in the meditation subjects for immersion.
ai-sn34:6.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in projecting the mind purified by immersion is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:6.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:6.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:7.0.3_0: Projecting the Mind Purified by immersion.
ai-sn34:7.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:7.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:7.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:7.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion.
ai-sn34:7.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in projecting the mind purified by immersion.
ai-sn34:7.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in projecting the mind purified by immersion.
ai-sn34:7.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in projecting the mind purified by immersion is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:7.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:7.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:8.0.3_0: Persistence in immersion, rooted in practicing carefully.
ai-sn34:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:8.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:8.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in practicing carefully for it. ...”
ai-sn34:8.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in immersion but is skilled in practicing carefully for it.
ai-sn34:8.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in practicing carefully for it.
ai-sn34:8.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in practicing carefully for it. ...”
ai-sn34:8.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in practicing carefully for it is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:8.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:8.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:9.0.3_0: Persistence in immersion and rooted in speech.
ai-sn34:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:9.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:9.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:9.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion but not in practicing persistently for it.
ai-sn34:9.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:9.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:9.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in practicing persistently for it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:9.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:9.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:10.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:10.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:10.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it. ...”
ai-sn34:10.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in doing what’s conducive to immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:10.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in immersion nor in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:10.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:10.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:10.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:10.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:10.1.12_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:11.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:11.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:11.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in remaining in it. ...”
ai-sn34:11.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in remaining in immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:11.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:11.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:11.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in entering immersion and remaining in it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:11.1.9_0: Suppose there was a boat of milk.
ai-sn34:11.1.10_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:12.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:12.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:12.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in emerging from it. ...”
ai-sn34:12.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in emerging from immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:12.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in emerging from it.
ai-sn34:12.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering and remaining in it.
ai-sn34:12.1.8_0: Take the case of the mendicants who practice absorption meditation ...
ai-sn34:12.1.9_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:13.0.3_0: Unconded by the gods of stream-entry,
ai-sn34:13.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:13.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:13.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:13.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:13.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:13.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in gladdening the mind for immersion. ...”

ai-sn34:13.1.9_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:14.0.3_0: based on the basis of psychic power.

ai-sn34:14.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:14.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in the supports for it. ...”
ai-sn34:14.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in the supports for immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:14.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in the supports for it.
ai-sn34:14.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in the supports for it. ...”
ai-sn34:14.1.8_0: There they meditate here accompanied by defilements.
ai-sn34:14.1.9_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:15.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:15.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:15.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:15.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in the meditation subjects for immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:15.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion.
ai-sn34:15.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion.

ai-sn34:16.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:16.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:16.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:16.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:16.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in projecting the mind purified by immersion.
ai-sn34:16.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”

ai-sn34:17.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:17.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:17.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in practicing carefully for it. ...”
ai-sn34:17.1.5_0: One meditator is not skilled in practicing carefully for immersion but is skilled in entering it.
ai-sn34:17.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in practicing carefully for it. ...”
ai-sn34:17.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in practicing carefully for it. ...”

ai-sn34:18.0.3_0: Unconciled and rooted in the Discourse on Taking.
ai-sn34:18.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:18.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:18.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:18.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion but not in entering it.
ai-sn34:18.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:18.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:18.1.8_0: There they meditate here accompanied by defilements.
ai-sn34:18.1.9_0: is said to be a fine horse.”
ai-sn34:19.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:19.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:19.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in entering immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it. ...”
ai-sn34:19.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in doing what’s conducive to immersion but not in entering it.
ai-sn34:19.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in entering immersion nor in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:19.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in entering immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:19.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled in entering immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:19.1.9_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee.
ai-sn34:19.1.10_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled in entering immersion and remaining in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.”
ai-sn34:19.1.11_0: is less than twenty years old.
ai-sn34:19.1.12_0: (These are sections on the previous discourse.)
ai-sn34:20-27.0.3_0: He should stand on topic and cutting it against the wind.
ai-sn34:20-27.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:20-27.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:20-27.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in remaining in immersion but not in emerging from it. ...”
ai-sn34:20-27.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in emerging from immersion but not in remaining in it.
ai-sn34:20-27.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in remaining in immersion nor in emerging from it.
ai-sn34:20-27.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in remaining in immersion and in emerging from it.
ai-sn34:20-27.1.8_0: Take the case of the mendicants who practice absorption meditation ...
ai-sn34:20-27.1.9_0: is fine in the highest, and finest.”
ai-sn34:20-27.1.11_0: (These eight discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:28-34.0.3_0: He should stand on the previous evening’s advice, and has been tranquilized.
ai-sn34:28-34.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:28-34.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:28-34.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in emerging from immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:28-34.1.5_0: They’re skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion, not in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion.
ai-sn34:28-34.1.6_0: One who is not skilled in emerging from immersion but is skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:28-34.1.7_0: They’re skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion and in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:28-34.1.8_0: Now, the mendicants who practice absorption meditation ...
ai-sn34:28-34.1.9_0: is fine in the highest, and finest.”
ai-sn34:28-34.1.11_0: (These seven discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:35-40.0.3_0: Because of heedlessness, the support of his wound, and healed.
ai-sn34:35-40.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion but not in the supports for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:35-40.1.3_0: One is skilled in the supports for immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:35-40.1.4_0: One who is skilled neither in gladdening the mind for immersion nor in the supports for immersion.
ai-sn34:35-40.1.5_0: They’re skilled in gladdening the mind, skilled in the supports for immersion, and in the supports for immersion.
ai-sn34:35-40.1.6_0: Take the case of the mendicants who practice absorption meditation ...
ai-sn34:35-40.1.7_0: is fine in the highest, and finest.”
ai-sn34:35-40.1.9_0: (These six discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:41-45.0.3_0: Five on taking sides, rooted in the past, and unified on the supporter of the future.
ai-sn34:41-45.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in the supports for immersion but not in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:41-45.1.3_0: One meditator is skilled in the supports for immersion but not in the supports for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:41-45.1.4_0: One neither in the supports for immersion nor in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:41-45.1.5_0: The supports for immersion and the supports for immersion.

ai-sn34:41-45.1.7_0: is fine in the highest, and finest.”
ai-sn34:41-45.1.9_0: (These five discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:46-49.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:46-49.1.3_0: One meditator is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion but not in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:46-49.1.4_0: One neither skilled nor trained in immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion.
ai-sn34:46-49.1.5_0: but skilled in the meditation subjects for immersion and in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:46-49.1.6_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee.
ai-sn34:46-49.1.7_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled in the meditation subjects for immersion and skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”

ai-sn34:50-52.0.3_0: Because of heedfulness, the root of poison, and the pith.
ai-sn34:50-52.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion but not in practicing carefully for it. ...”
ai-sn34:50-52.1.3_0: One is skilled in practicing carefully for immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:50-52.1.4_0: One who is skilled neither in projecting the mind purified by immersion nor in practicing carefully for it. ...”

ai-sn34:53-54.0.3_0: Right away they are rooted in speech, based on heaven, and meet with do what is grave.
ai-sn34:53-54.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in practicing carefully for immersion but not in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:53-54.1.3_0: practicing carefully for immersion but not in practicing carefully for it.
ai-sn34:53-54.1.4_0: One neither skilled nor trained in immersion.
ai-sn34:53-54.1.5_0: meditator is skilled in practicing carefully for immersion and in practicing persistently for it.
ai-sn34:53-54.1.6_0: Take the case of the person who ...
ai-sn34:53-54.1.7_0: is fine in the highest, and finest.”
ai-sn34:53-54.2.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:55.1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of practice.
ai-sn34:55.1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn34:55.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in doing what’s conducive to immersion but not in practicing persistently for it.
ai-sn34:55.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in practicing persistently for immersion nor in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:55.1.9_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee.
ai-sn34:55.1.10_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.”
ai-sn34:55.1.11_0: This is what the Buddha said.
ai-sn34:55.1.12_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-sn34:55.1.14_0: (This should be expanded as in the five ways.)
ai-sn34:55.1.15_0: The third sub-chapter on the aggregates is finished.
ai-sn34:55.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on Absorption are complete.
ai-sn34:55.3.7_0: The Book of the Aggregates is finished.
